admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa
colti:
Technical operations projects series ; no.
            TO 487

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project consists of the
            construction and the equipment of 21 multilateral secondary
            schools which provide basic education with alternative
            biases (e.g. arts, sciences, commerce, home economics,
            technical, etc.). The total estimated cost is about DH 80.7
            million, equivalent to US$16.2 million. This cost is made up
            to about $2.4 million for sites, $1.1 million for site
            development works and $7.1 million for construction.
            Furniture, domestic appliances, science laboratories and
            workshop equipment and libraries take about $3.2 million
            while professional fees and contingencies account for about
            $2.4 million.
